name: Tank Game
description:
Tank Game is a Local-Multiplayer Action game in which you and up to 7 friends select any of nearly 50 unique, super-powered... "Tanks"... and use them to blast each other off the map!

Tank Powers include, but are not limited to:
- Hypnosis
- Invisibility
- Painting
- Gun
- Time Manipulation
- Nuclear Warfare
- A Lobster
- And Many More!

Features:
- 18 Maps
- 48 Tanks
- Cheat Codes
- 8 Player Support
- Multiple Monitor Support
- Remote Play Compatible
- Local and Global Stat Boards
